Html:
Hallo everybody,

firsly thanks for all for this project, great job :)

I have problems with the GMarkerGoogle. I have integrated the whole GMarkerGoogle Resources to my VisualStudio.

When iam starting the project, its all right and OK the currentmarker,

currentMarker = new GMarkerGoogle(MainMap.Position, GMarkerGoogleType.green_small

 is showing gree_small. That is OK.

 

But now to the Problem i want to show the Route with this code

GMapMarker m1 = new GMarkerGoogle(start, GMarkerGoogleType.green_big_go);
            var m3 = GMapProviders.GoogleMap.GetPlacemark(currentMarker.Position, out status);

 

but if i am click start route, than iam getting a NullReferenceException on LoadBitmap() on class GMarkerControl.

Size =  new System.Drawing.Size (Bitmap.Width, Bitmap.Height); <--- NullReferenceException

I dont know, why??

I want to have other new images as marker, so i have added new Recources to my project designer with Recources.resx!

and now i have a NullReferenceException on start route with this marker, do you understand my problem??  :)
sorry i use my brain, but i still get a NullReferenceException :)
..just debug, find what object is null, all internal bitmaps are ok

Size =  new System.Drawing.Size (Bitmap.Width, Bitmap.Height) is null

on LoadBitmap() on class GMarkerControl.
The problem is solved, the name of resources was wrong, painful :)
